jd: [Moises.ai](https://moises.ai/it/) is looking for motivated PhD students for summer internships. Please send your application (CV, research goal, expertise, ...) to igor@moises.ai. or through the ISMIR [form](https://forms.gle/54jzCjuEMDQH8Mrv7).
title: Moises
